body.name: TCL Air Purifier for Home Room Bedroom, Smart WiFi Alexa Control, True H13 HEPA Air Filter Remove 99.97% Smoke Odor Pet Dander Dust Pollen Mold Air Cleaner Metal Design with Night Light
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 17 hrs 31 mins
features: CLEANER AIR IN ONLY 15 MINUTES: Your Breeva Air Purifier takes as little as 15 minutes to filter rooms up to 161 ft. sq. or in as little as 30 minutes for rooms up to 322 sq. ft. *

BREEVA 3-STAGE FILTRATION SYSTEM: Features a pre-filter, True HEPA (H13), and activated carbon filter that eliminates 99.97% of dust, pollen, mold, bacteria, and other airborne particles as well as absorbs odor, smoke, and volatile organic compounds that can be found in household cleaning supplies. (Filter Life 3-6 months)^
360-DEGREE CLEAN: The tabletop designed tower provides 360-degree air intake and propels clean, fresh air throughout your room from the top of the unit.

APP & VOICE CONTROL READY: Link your Breeva to your Alexa or Google Assistant devices to easily control your air purifier using only your voice. The TCL Home App allows you to control your air purifier from anywhere, right from your smartphone. Check the air purifier status, view air quality history, change fan speeds, and more.

SLEEP SOUNDLY, WAKE UP REFRESHED: Enjoy a peaceful, full night of sleep with Breeva's sleep mode, which operates a level quieter than a whisper allowing you to sleep soundly and wake up to clean, fresh air.
CLEAN AIR ON YOUR TIME: The Breeva Air Purifier is built with simplicity in mind. Users can set the Breeva to turn off in 1, 2, 4, and 8-hour intervals using the Timer feature.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES: No need to guess when to change your filter. Your Breeva air filter notifies you of your filter's status using LED indicators. Also, the panel lock feature ensures that no child or furry friend accidentally changes your settings.

MINIMALIST DESIGN THAT’S SURPRISINGLY COLORFUL: The Breeva’s minimalistic tabletop design features a multi-color ambient light so you can pick the color that suits your mood (Blue/Green/Purple/Rainbow).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Experience Clean Air 5X Per Hour Cleaner and fresher air in rooms up to 182 sq. ft. in only 12 minutes with the whole-room design!*† App & Voice Control Easily purify your home with simple voice commands or by using the simple and easy TCL Home app. Next page 1 Feature Summary 2 Clean Air 5X Per Hour 3 App & Voice Control

Stage 1: Pre-Filter Captures dust, pet hair, and other large particles. Stage 2: True HEPA (H13) Eliminates at least 99.97% of dust, pollen, mold, bacteria, and airborne particles from your home's air.^ Stage 3: Activated Carbon Removes smoke, odor, and volatile organic compounds that can be found in household cleaning supplies.
Wake Up Revitalized Enjoy a peaceful, full night of sleep with Breeva's sleep mode, which is quiet… like ultra-quiet (only 26 decibels), allowing you to sleep soundly and wake up to fresh air.

Minimalist Design That’s Surprisingly Colorful The Breeva A1W’s minimalistic tabletop design features a multi-color ambient light so you can pick the color that suits your mood (Blue/Green/Purple/Rainbow). Clean Air on Your Time The easy-to-use Timer makes it easy to clean air on your time (1/2/4/8-Hours) Additional Features The Filter Replacement removes the guesswork, letting you know when to change filters while the panel lock ensures no children or furry friends accidentally change the settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's quiet and works great good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this product! Put it in my room and within minutes noticed a difference. Worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall great product
reviews.reviewText: I was very hesitant to buy a purifier anywhere seeing everyone’s experiences. I went on a limb and bought this one and I do not regret it! It was delivered much sooner than it was suppose to and it was very well packaged, and easy to put together. The app is just a plus all together! I have also noticed a big difference in the air quality and I’m super happy with it. It’s not too loud when it’s on the highest level, but definitely noticeable, almost like a fan. The other fan settings (regarding sleep mode) are nice as well. It’s perfect for someone who just likes a little background noise, not distracting but also not dead quite. The sleep mode is excellent! I always forget I even have it on!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value for the Money
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this air cleaner!I have 3 dogs that come in at night to sleep. It smells like dog in the living room. This air cleaner cleared out the air within a couple of days! I'm going to purchase another for the bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great item, not always easy to automate
reviews.reviewText: It requires visible 2.4ghz SSID of network to log into app or home automation. Unfortunately my router only transmits on 5ghz. Cable company setup and I can't change it. Not a fault of the item but just FYI.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little machine
reviews.reviewText: I purchased machine for my American Bully she has allergies. This machine has truly a blessing. It has made such a change in the air quality that she does not snore and is able to breathe better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with Alexa
reviews.reviewText: The smart air purifier is simple to control from its app or Alexa. Small and perfect for being in my bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent air purifier
reviews.reviewText: Performs great. Works with my Wi-Fi. Very quiet.

Llevaba mucho tiempo buscando un purificador de aire, pero no me convencían ni los precios ni la calidad de los que estaban disponibles, hasta que encontré este con una muy buena oferta. El diseño es bonito, funciona bien, tiene luces que se pueden cambiar y además se conecta con Alexa. Fue muy fácil instalarlo y vincularlo. No más alergias!
